ðŸ“– Summary: Caffeine is a high-performance caching library for Java that provides an in-memory cache with features like automatic loading, size-based eviction, time-based expiration, and asynchronous refresh. It offers flexible configuration options and extensions for JCache, Guava, and simulation, making it suitable for various caching scenarios in Java applications.
